snippet.title: Sonic.exe The Disaster 2D Remake — Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the full public release right now!
https://gamejolt.com/games/disaster2dr/780541
-----
Sonic.exe The Disaster 2D Remake is adapting and rebalancing well-known Roblox experience in 2 dimensions, adding many additional mechanics and features for gameplay diversity.
The game made in association with the Exe Empire Discord community.

Official Discord Server: https://discord.gg/thedisaster2d
Exe Empire Discord Server: https://discord.com/invite/exeempire
-----
Trailer crew:

- Montage: @Catswell 
- Main footages: @Philnex  and @Merfyscorner 
- Other footages: @SunDoesStuff; @MrDoomTulenKnuckles; @yesmen10; @Motidzuki777 
- Intro animation: @hamsterman7895 
- Thumbnail art: @uncle30 
-----
Music:

- Klonoa 2 - Hyuponia - Ruin of Sadness
- Corpse Party: Blood Covered - Repeated Fear (PSP) - Chapter 1's Main Theme
-----
Sonic.exe The Disaster 2D Remake
#thedisaster2d #fangame #sonicexe
2023
